title: Newcastle upon Tyne
name: Centre For Life
price: Admission prices depend on your age, whether you are a UK tax payer and if you want to make a charitable donation
content: This 'science city' in the centre of Newcastle has interactive exhibits that kids of all ages will likely enjoy.  The facility houses a state of the art research facility, the Life Science Centre, where its scientists are the first people in Europe - and only the second in the world - to get a license for stem cell research on human embryos. There is also an interactive museum that looks at DNA, the human body and the origins of life, as well as a visitors centre.
